messages.message:
There’s a use case / workflow that has come from RenRe, and I’m keen to see if what other people think and if it might apply to other customers. https://www.loom.com/share/1c1a3c8ed0dd47f0b6d2f11da5453be1
The summary is that:
• You would have a document processing through a build app. 
• The extracted information and results (as well as the original document repo) are then placed into the Converse interface
• The app output (as part of whatever the Build is designed to produce) could offer insights based on the processed documents and allow users to ask predefined or custom questions about the output.
• Could be mainly useful for knowledge-based workers who want automation without losing the ability to interact with and query the results.
i think there’s already a ticket (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1853) for this, but so far we haven’t prioritized it for Q3
Yes! We are looking into similar use cases (Review + Converse) as Serena mentioned. Would love to dive deeper into RenRe’s workflow if there are more details. cc @avi @Kaustubh (KD)
